sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in something else
, je zaprto v nekaj ali obkroženo z nečim.

seg.quote: We put them away in a big box.
We've just found a body in the water.
She opened her bag and put her diary in.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in a place
, je na nekem kraju.

seg.quote: I wanted to play in the garden.
She locked herself in the bathroom.
In Hamburg the girls split up.
I could not sleep because of the pain in my feet.

sense.def:
To be in
pomeni biti navzoč doma ali v službi.

seg.quote: He's never in when I phone.

sense.def:
To come in
pomeni vstopiti v sobo ali stavbo.

seg.quote: There was a knock at Howard's door. ‘Come in,’ he shouted.
He had his meals brought in.

sense.def:
Kadar vlak, ladja ali letalo
is in
ali
has come in
, je prispelo.

seg.quote: The train's not in yet.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in a window
, je tik za oknom, zlasti izložbenim oknom, tako da se vidi od zunaj.

seg.quote: How much is the hat in the window?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj vidimo
in a mirror
, vidimo odsev nečesa v ogledalu.

To be in a piece of clothing
pomeni nositi oblačilo.

seg.quote: Martin was in his pyjamas.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in a book, film, play, or picture
, tisto lahko beremo ali vidimo v knjigi, filmu, igri ali na sliki.

seg.quote: She dies in the last act.
In Chapter 7 this point is discussed in detail.

sense.def:
To be in a play, race, or other activity
pomeni biti ena od oseb, ki sodelujejo v igri, dirki ali pri kakšni drugi dejavnosti.

seg.quote: She took part in a marathon.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
in a particular year, month, or season
, se zgodi v tistem letu, mesecu ali sezoni.

seg.quote: In 1872, Chicago was burned to the ground.
It'll be warmer in the spring.

sense.def:
Kdor nekaj naredi
in a particular period of time
, potrebuje toliko časa, da tisto naredi.

seg.quote: I told him the money would be paid back in six months.

sense.def:
Kadar se bo nekaj zgodilo
in a particular length of time
, se bo zgodilo po takem obdobju.

seg.quote: In another five minutes it'll be pitch dark.

sense.def:
Kdor je
in a particular state or situation
, je njegovo zdajšnje stanje ali položaj tak.

seg.quote: We are in a position to advise our Indian friends.

sense.def:
Z besedo
in
omenimo občutek ali čustvo, ki pri nekom povzroči, da se vede na določen način.

seg.quote: He shook his head in admiration.
In his excitement, Billy had forgotten the letter.

sense.def:
Z besedo
in
zožimo splošno témo ali polje dejavnosti.

seg.quote: ...recent advances in mathematics.
He plans to make his career in music.

sense.def:
Z besedo
in
povemo, koliko oseb ali stvari nekaj počne.

seg.quote: Students flocked to the SDP in considerable numbers.

sense.def:
Z besedo
in
izrazimo približno starost ali temperaturo. Na primer: kadar je neka oseba
in his fifties
, je stara od 50 do 59 let. Kadar je temperatura
in the seventies
, je med 70 in 79 stopinjami.

seg.quote: In her twenties and thirties she had had no difficulty in finding jobs.

sense.def:
Z besedo
in
povemo, kako je nekaj izraženo.

seg.quote: I need your complaints in writing.
She spoke in a calm, friendly voice.
They were speaking in French.

sense.def:
Z besedo
in
opišemo razporeditev ali obliko nečesa.

seg.quote: The students sit in a circle on the floor.

sense.def:
Z besedo
in
določimo, na kaj se nekaj nanaša.

seg.quote: It grew to eight metres in length.
We need a change in direction.
Bright colours are in this year.

sense.def:
Kadar morje ali plima
comes in
, se voda pomakne proti obali in ne proč od nje.

Z izrazom
in that
pojasnimo trditev, ki smo jo pravkar izrekli.

seg.quote: He's a good listener in that he never interrupts you with thoughts of his own.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
in for a shock or a surprise
, bo doživel šok ali presenečenje.

To be in on something
pomeni biti vpleten v nekaj ali vedeti za nekaj.
